description: This file sets up a knowledge base from a PDF URL, initializes an agent with a specific language model, and queries the agent for a response about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with a language model and a knowledge base to generate responses.

classes.name: LlamaOpenAI
classes.description: A class representing a specific Llama model configuration for use with the agent.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a vector database interface using PostgreSQL and pgvector.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the agent's response to a given prompt, optionally in markdown format.
